languages.text: {n}Кисло поглядев на экран, дознаватель убирает инфопластину в сторону.{/n} "Вещественных доказательств удалось собрать не так много. Однако один лишь факт, что Вольный Торговец при атаке темных эльдаров на его торговые суда и миры оказывал{mf|ся|ась} в нужном месте, пусть и не всегда своевременно, — лучшее доказательство того, что {mf|он|она} {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_ServedDrukhari}работал{mf||а} в коалиции с другими ксеносами{/d}, предоставляющими людям подробную информацию о передвижениях кабала и последующих целях атаки".

traits.locale_text: {n}Кисло поглядев на экран, дознаватель убирает инфопластину в сторону.{/n} "Вещественных доказательств удалось собрать не так много. Однако один лишь факт, что Вольный Торговец при атаке темных эльдар на его торговые суда и миры оказывал{mf|ся|ась} в нужном месте, пусть и не всегда своевремено, — лучшее докозательство того, что {mf|он|она} работал{mf||а} в коалиции с другими ксеносами, предоставляющими людям подробную информацию о передвижениях кабала и последующих целях атаки".

languages.text: {n}The Interrogator gives the data-slate a sour look and puts it away.{/n} "There was not much evidence to collect, but the mere fact the Rogue Trader inevitably ended up in the right place when the Drukhari attacked {mf|his|her} worlds and merchant vessels, even sometimes late, is the best proof that {mf|he|she} was {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_ServedDrukhari}collaborating with other xenos{/d}. Who else could provide detailed information about the Kabal's future movements and raiding targets?"
languages.original_text: {n}Кисло поглядев на экран, дознаватель убирает инфопластину в сторону.{/n} "Вещественных доказательств удалось собрать не так много. Однако один лишь факт, что Вольный Торговец при атаке темных эльдаров на его торговые суда и миры оказывал{mf|ся|ась} в нужном месте, пусть и не всегда своевременно, — лучшее доказательство того, что {mf|он|она} {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_ServedDrukhari}работал{mf||а} в коалиции с другими ксеносами{/d}, предоставляющими людям подробную информацию о передвижениях кабала и последующих целях атаки".

traits.locale_text: {n}The Interrogator gives the data-slate a sour look and puts it away.{/n} "There was not much evidence to collect, but the mere fact the Rogue Trader inevitably ended up in the right place when the Drukhari attacked {mf|his|her} worlds and merchant vessels, even sometimes late, is the best proof {mf|he|she} collaborated with other xenos. Who else could provide the detailed information about the Kabal's future movements and raiding targets?"

Who else could provide detailed information about the Kabal's future movements and raiding targets?"

{n}The Interrogator gives the data-slate a sour look and puts it away.{/n} "There was not much evidence to collect, but the mere fact the Rogue Trader inevitably ended up in the right place when the Drukhari attacked {mf|his|her} worlds and merchant vessels, even sometimes late, is the best proof that {mf|he|she} was {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_ServedDrukhari}collaborating with other xenos{/d}. {n}The Interrogator gives the data-slate a sour look and puts it away.{/n} "There was not much evidence to collect, but the mere fact the Rogue Trader inevitably ended up in the right place when the Drukhari attacked {mf|his|her} worlds and merchant vessels, even sometimes late, is the best proof that {mf|he|she} was {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_ServedDrukhari}collaborating with other xenos{/d}. Who else could provide detailed information about the Kabal's future movements and raiding targets?"

languages.text: {n}L'interrogateur jette un regard acerbe à sa plaque de données et la range.{/n} « Même si les preuves n'abondent pas, le simple fait que {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} se trouvait inévitablement au bon endroit lorsque les Drukharis attaquaient ses mondes et ses vaisseaux marchands, même avec du retard, est la preuve irréfutable de sa {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_ServedDrukhari}collaboration avec les xénos{/d}. Qui d'autre aurait pu lui fournir des informations détaillées sur les futurs mouvements de la Kabale et les cibles de ses assauts ? »
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator gives the data-slate a sour look and puts it away.{/n} "There was not much evidence to collect, but the mere fact the Rogue Trader inevitably ended up in the right place when the Drukhari attacked {mf|his|her} worlds and merchant vessels, even sometimes late, is the best proof that {mf|he|she} was {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_ServedDrukhari}collaborating with other xenos{/d}. Who else could provide detailed information about the Kabal's future movements and raiding targets?"

traits.locale_text: {n}L'interrogateur jette un regard acerbe à sa plaque de données et la range.{/n} « Même si les preuves n'abondent pas, le simple fait que {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} se trouvait inévitablement au bon endroit lorsque les Drukharis attaquaient ses mondes et ses vaisseaux marchands, même avec du retard, est la preuve irréfutable de sa collaboration avec les xénos. Qui d'autre aurait pu lui fournir des informations détaillées sur les futurs mouvements de la Kabale et les cibles de ses assauts ? »

languages.text: {n}海因里希不满地看了一眼数据板，之后把它收了起来。{/n}“虽然法庭没有太多证据可以作为呈堂证供，但每当黑暗灵族袭击行商浪人的世界与商船时，{mf|他|她}每次都会刚好出现在最该去的地方，尽管偶尔可能会迟来片刻。这就是{mf|他|她}{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_ServedDrukhari}与其他异形同流合污{/d}的有力证据。若非如此，还有谁能提供如此详细的信息，向{mf|他|她}告知阴谋团接下来行动计划与具体目标？”
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator gives the data-slate a sour look and puts it away.{/n} "There was not much evidence to collect, but the mere fact the Rogue Trader inevitably ended up in the right place when the Drukhari attacked {mf|his|her} worlds and merchant vessels, even sometimes late, is the best proof that {mf|he|she} was {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_ServedDrukhari}collaborating with other xenos{/d}. Who else could provide detailed information about the Kabal's future movements and raiding targets?"

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希不满地看了一眼数据板，之后把它收了起来。{/n}“虽然法庭没有太多证据可以作为呈堂证供，但每当黑暗灵族袭击行商浪人的世界与商船时，{mf|他|她}每次都会刚好出现在最该去的地方，尽管偶尔可能会迟来片刻。这就是{mf|他|她}与其他异形同流合污的有力证据。若非如此，还有谁能提供如此详细的信息，向{mf|他|她}告知阴谋团接下来行动计划与具体目标？”

languages.text: {n}インテロゲイターは不機嫌そうな表情を浮かべてデータスレートをしまい込んだ。{/n}「証拠はそう多くはなかった。だが{mf|彼|彼女}の世界や商船に対するデュカーリの攻撃は時に遅れ、さらにそういった時、自由開拓者は常に都合の良い場所にいた。その事実だけでも、{mf|彼|彼女}が{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_ServedDrukhari}他の異種族と協力していた{/d}何よりの証拠となる。陰謀団の将来的な動きや襲撃目標に関する詳細な情報を、他に誰が提供できるだろうか？」
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator gives the data-slate a sour look and puts it away.{/n} "There was not much evidence to collect, but the mere fact the Rogue Trader inevitably ended up in the right place when the Drukhari attacked {mf|his|her} worlds and merchant vessels, even sometimes late, is the best proof that {mf|he|she} was {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_ServedDrukhari}collaborating with other xenos{/d}. Who else could provide detailed information about the Kabal's future movements and raiding targets?"

traits.locale_text: {n}インテロゲイターは不機嫌そうな表情を浮かべてデータスレートをしまい込んだ。{/n}「証拠はそう多くはなかった。だが{mf|彼|彼女}の世界や商船に対するデュカーリの攻撃は時に遅れ、さらにそういった時、自由開拓者は常に都合の良い場所にいた。その事実だけでも、{mf|彼|彼女}が{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_ServedDrukhari}他の異種族と協力していた{/d}何よりの証拠となる。陰謀団の将来的な動きや襲撃目標に関する詳細な情報を、他に誰が提供できるだろうか？」

languages.text: {n}Der Interrogator blickt den Datablock verächtlich an und legt ihn weg.{/n} "Viele Beweise bekamen wir nicht zusammen, aber allein die Tatsache, dass {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} unweigerlich am richtigen Ort landete, als die Drukhari {mf|seine|ihre} Welten und Handelsschiffe angriffen, manchmal sogar zu spät, bilden den ultimativen Beweis, dass {mf|er|sie} {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_ServedDrukhari}mit anderen Xenos zusammengearbeitet haben muss{/d}. Wer sonst hätte denn detaillierte Informationen über zukünftige Bewegungen und Angriffsziele der Kabale liefern können?"
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator gives the data-slate a sour look and puts it away.{/n} "There was not much evidence to collect, but the mere fact the Rogue Trader inevitably ended up in the right place when the Drukhari attacked {mf|his|her} worlds and merchant vessels, even sometimes late, is the best proof that {mf|he|she} was {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_ServedDrukhari}collaborating with other xenos{/d}. Who else could provide detailed information about the Kabal's future movements and raiding targets?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Interrogator blickt den Datablock verächtlich an und legt ihn weg.{/n} "Viele Beweise bekamen wir nicht zusammen, aber allein die Tatsache, dass {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} unweigerlich am richtigen Ort landete, als die Drukhari {mf|seine|ihre} Welten und Handelsschiffe angriffen, manchmal sogar zu spät, bilden den ultimativen Beweis, dass {mf|er|sie} mit anderen Xenos zusammengearbeitet haben muss. Wer sonst hätte denn detaillierte Informationen über zukünftige Bewegungen und Angriffsziele der Kabale liefern können?"

{n}Der Interrogator blickt den Datablock verächtlich an und legt ihn weg.{/n} "Viele Beweise bekamen wir nicht zusammen, aber allein die Tatsache, dass {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} unweigerlich am richtigen Ort landete, als die Drukhari {mf|seine|ihre} Welten und Handelsschiffe angriffen, manchmal sogar zu spät, bilden den ultimativen Beweis, dass {mf|er|sie} mit anderen Xenos zusammengearbeitet haben muss. Wer sonst hätte denn detaillierte Informationen über zukünftige Bewegungen und Angriffsziele der Kabale liefern können?"

languages.text: {n}El interrogador mira la tablilla de datos con gesto contrariado y la guarda.{/n} «Apenas había pruebas que recopilar, pero el simple hecho de que {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente estuviese siempre en el lugar apropiado cuando los Drukhari atacaban sus mundos y navíos mercantes, aun cuando en ocasiones llegase tarde, es la evidencia más fehaciente de que {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_ServedDrukhari}colaboraba con otros xenos{/d}. ¿Quién si no podría haberle proporcionado la información necesaria sobre los movimientos y los blancos de la kábala?».
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator gives the data-slate a sour look and puts it away.{/n} "There was not much evidence to collect, but the mere fact the Rogue Trader inevitably ended up in the right place when the Drukhari attacked {mf|his|her} worlds and merchant vessels, even sometimes late, is the best proof that {mf|he|she} was {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_ServedDrukhari}collaborating with other xenos{/d}. Who else could provide detailed information about the Kabal's future movements and raiding targets?"

traits.locale_text: {n}El interrogador mira la tablilla de datos con gesto contrariado y la guarda.{/n} «Apenas había pruebas que recopilar, pero el simple hecho de que {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente estuviese siempre en el lugar apropiado cuando los Drukhari atacaban sus mundos y navíos mercantes, aun cuando en ocasiones llegase tarde, es la evidencia más fehaciente de que colaboraba con otros xenos. ¿Quién si no podría haberle proporcionado la información necesaria sobre los movimientos y los blancos de la kábala?».

languages.text: {n}Sorgucu, databelaya tatsız bir bakış atıp onu bir kenara koyuyor.{/n} "Elde edilebilecek çok fazla delil yoktu. Ancak Drukhariler, Hür Tacir'in dünyalarına ve tüccar gemilerine saldırdığında bazen gecikse de kaçınılmaz olarak her seferinde tam doğru yerde olması, Hür Tacir'in {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_ServedDrukhari}diğer zenolarla iş birliği yaptığının{/d} en açık kanıdır. Kabal'ın gelecekteki hareketleri ve baskın hedefleri hakkında detaylı bilgiyi başka kim sağlayabilir ki?"
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator gives the data-slate a sour look and puts it away.{/n} "There was not much evidence to collect, but the mere fact the Rogue Trader inevitably ended up in the right place when the Drukhari attacked {mf|his|her} worlds and merchant vessels, even sometimes late, is the best proof that {mf|he|she} was {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_ServedDrukhari}collaborating with other xenos{/d}. Who else could provide detailed information about the Kabal's future movements and raiding targets?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Sorgucu, databelaya tatsız bir bakış atıyor ve onu bir kenara koyuyor.{/n} "Elde edilebilecek çok fazla delil yoktu ancak Drukhariler, Hür Tacir'in dünyalarına ve tüccar gemilerine saldırdığında, bazen gecikse de kaçınılmaz olarak her seferinde tam doğru yerde olması, Hür Tacir'in diğer zenolarla iş birliği içinde olduğunun en iyi kanıdır. Kabal'ın gelecek hareketleri ve baskın hedefleri hakkında detaylı bilgiyi başka kim sağlayabilir?"
